localised_description: Your investigation has proven fruitful, indeed. It seems the Blue Scribes of Tzeentch – P'tarix and Xirat'p – are the frenzied force behind the haphazard magics that have plagued so many battlefields across the land. Better yet, a clue to their current location has now reared its head, as Chaos surges within a nearby settlement. If you act quickly, you could capture the region before the Blue Scribes have chance to move on, spreading their twisted mischief further outside of your reach.
